register.headline: Are you an Amazon customer?
register.text: Skip the manual input by using the address and client information stored in your Amazon account.

unlink.headline: Remove Amazon account link
unlink.subText: If you want to disconnect from your Amazon account, click the "Disconnect from Amazon account" button.

modal.text: When you unlink your Amazon account, you will be asked to enter a new password. You will then only be able to use your account with your email address and the new password.

link.headline: Link Amazon account
link.subText: To use your Amazon account to login to %shopname% click here:
link.success: Your account is now linked with Amazon.

purePaymentRedirect.text: You will automatically be redirected to Amazon Pay. Please don't leave this page.
